Ladies and Gentlemen, start your engines! It's time to go racing!
 
 Go-Kart Speed:
 ・Standard = 5.25m/s
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Go-Kart - Red
 (2) Go-Kart - Blue
 (3) Go-Kart - Flames
 (4) Go-Kart - Racing Suit - Male
 (5) Go-Kart - Racing Suit - Female
 (6) Go-Kart - Racing Helmet - Male
 (7) Go-Kart - Racing Helmet - Female
 (8) Go-Kart - Racing Gloves - Male
 (9) Go-Kart - Racing Gloves - Female
 (10) Go-Kart - Racing Boots - Male
 (11) Go-Kart - Racing Boots - Female [#Legal]

 (8) Kart - Gants de course - Homme
 (9) Kart - Gants de course - Femme
 (10) Kart - Bottes de course - Homme
 (11) Kart - Bottes de course - Femme [#Legal]
